    <!-- start temp fix for jira-10758 -->
    <script>
     try {
  window.addEventListener('load', function () {
    function isAppOrder() {
      var deviceType;
      if (ANF.models.cart !== undefined && ANF.models.cart.orderAttributes !== undefined) {
        for (var i = 0; i < ANF.models.cart.orderAttributes.length; i++) {
          if (ANF.models.cart.orderAttributes[i].attrName === 'DeviceType') {
            deviceType = ANF.models.cart.orderAttributes[i].attrValue;
            break;
          }
        }
        if ((typeof deviceType !== 'undefined') && (deviceType === 'Android') || (deviceType === 'IPhone')) {
          return true;
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    if ($('body').hasClass('checkout-mainpage') && !isAppOrder()) {
      $('.checkout-mainpage .gift-card-details-bottom').hide()
    }
  })
} catch (e) {};
    </script>
    <!-- end temp fix for jira-10758 -->

            }
            .flyout-marketing-container--bottom .content-ops-nav .rs-nav__cat-column .marketing.content-flyout-nav-marketing,
            .flyout-marketing-container--bottom .content-ops-nav--image .rs-nav__cat-column .marketing.content-flyout-nav-marketing {
              margin-left:-15px;
              padding-top:60px;
            }
            /*.flyout-marketing-container--bottom .content-ops-nav li.rs-nav__cat-column.marketing.content-flyout-nav-marketing,
            .flyout-marketing-container--bottom .content-ops-nav--image li.rs-nav__cat-column.marketing.content-flyout-nav-marketing {
              margin-left:-15px;
            }*/
            .flyout-marketing-container--bottom .content-ops-nav--image .ops-flyout-nav-image-section__img {
              width:240px;
              margin-top:46px;
            }
            #rs-header:not(.rs-nav-v2) .content-ops-nav--image .rs-nav__cat-column.featured {
    left:0px;
  }
            #rs-header.rs-nav-v2 .rs-nav__cat-wrap .flyout-marketing-container--bottom .rs-cat-nav__header {
              margin-bottom:0;
            }
        }

        /* html update notes
        - add new espot
  
        - add class rs-cat-nav__header to mens/womens title
        */
              </style>

       <div class="product-price-v2__inner" data-high-list-price="52.95" data-low-list-price="52.95" data-price-flag="1" data-price-type="" itemprop="offers" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Offer">
        <div class="scope-1892">
         <span class="product-price" data-state="">
          <span class="screen-reader-text">
           $52.95 CAD
          </span>
          <span aria-hidden="true" class="product-price-text-wrapper">
           <span class="product-price-text ds-override" data-size="" data-state="">
            $52.95 CAD
           </span>
          </span>
         </span>
        </div>
       </div>

      <!-- mp_trans_disable_start -->

<script id="productTile" type="text/template">
 {{#categories}}
		{{#label}}
			<li class="cat-name">
				<h2 class="cat-name-header">{{label}}</h2>
			</li>
		{{/label}}
		{{#products}}
			<li
				class="rs-product-card rs-product-card--{{brand}} product-wrap {{inRowPosition}}"
				data-img-seq="{{dynDataImgSeq}}"
				data-swatch-seq="{{dynSwatchSeq}}">

				<div
					id="pid-{{catentryId}}"
					class="product {{#modelBackround}}model-bottom{{/modelBackround}} lazy-load-container {{productType}} {{#isSoldOut}}sold-out{{/isSoldOut}}"
					data-collection="{{productCollection}}"
					data-long-sku="{{longSku}}"
					data-sequence="{{initColorSeq}}"
					data-seq="{{initColorSeq}}"
					data-productId="{{catentryId}}">

					<input type="hidden" name="productType" value="{{productType}}">
					<div class="product-badge--grid">
						{{#isNewArrival}}
							<span class="new-arrival">
								New!
							</span>
						{{/isNewArrival}}
					</div>
					<div class="image-placeholder">
						<div class="image-wrap {{#isOFP}}ofp-wrap{{/isOFP}} lazyload">
							<a class="grid-product__image-link" href="{{productUrl}}" data-seq="{{initColorSeq}}" data-productId="{{catentryId}}" data-categoryid="{{subCategoryId}}">

								

								<img id="prod-img-{{catentryId}}" class="rs-img prod-img pointer {{imagePresets.imageClass}} lazyload"
								data-s7-preset="product-{{brand}}-v1" data-brand="{{brand}}" data-src="https://anf.scene7.com/is/image/anf/{{product.imageId}}_{{imageNameSuffix}}?$product-{{brand}}-v1$&wid=350&hei=438" alt="{{brandGender}} {{name}}" />

							<noscript>
								<img id="prod-img-{{catentryId}}" class="rs-img prod-img pointer {{imagePresets.imageClass}} lazyload"
								data-s7-preset="product-{{brand}}-v1" src="https://anf.scene7.com/is/image/anf/{{product.imageId}}_{{imageNameSuffix}}?$product-{{brand}}-v1$&wid=350&hei=438" alt="{{brandGender}} {{name}}" data-brand="{{brand}}" />
							</noscript>
						</a>

						<div class="rs-1-2 rs-sm-1-1 grid-product__quick-view-wrapper no-linkify">
							
							<div class="rs-hidden-sm rs-sm-1-1 rs-hidden-sm">
								<a href="{{productUrl}}" data-productId="{{catentryId}}" data-categoryid="{{categoryId}}" class="grid-product__quick-view product-quickview__button" aria-label="Quickview"><span>Quickview</span>
								</a>
							</div>
						</div>
					</div>
					<div class="product-info">
						<div class="name">
							<a href="{{productUrl}}" data-productId="{{catentryId}}" data-categoryId="{{categoryId}}">{{{name}}}</a>
						</div>
						<span class="desc">{{{shortDesc}}}</span>
						<div class="product-price-v2" data-priceFlag="{{price.priceFlag}}">
							<div class="product-price-v2--inner" data-priceFlag="{{price.priceFlag}}">
								{{#isSoldOut}}
									<span class="product-price-v2__price product-price-v2__price--sold-out" data-property="GLB_SOLDOUT">Sold Out</span>
								{{/isSoldOut}}
								{{^isSoldOut}}
									{{#price.showSalePrice}}
										<span class="product-price-v2__price product-price-v2__price--list product-price-v2__price--sale">
											{{#price.showLowListPrice}}{{{price.lowListPrice}}} - {{/price.showLowListPrice}}{{{price.highListPrice}}}
										</span>
									{{/price.showSalePrice}}
									<span class="product-price-v2__price product-price-v2__price--offer">
										{{#price.showLowPrice}}{{{price.priceLow}}}-{{/price.showLowPrice}}{{{price.priceHigh}}}
									</span>
								{{/isSoldOut}}
							</div>
							<div class="product-price-v2__promo-info">
								{{#xmMessaging}}
									<div class="product-price-v2__promo-info product-price-v2__promo-info--xm">
										{{xmMessaging}}
									</div>
								{{/xmMessaging}}
								{{#bogoMessaging}}
									<div class="product-price-v2__promo-info product-price-v2__promo-info--bogo">
										{{bogoMessaging}}
									</div>
								{{/bogoMessaging}}
							</div>
						</div>
					</div>
					{{#hasSwatches}}
						<div class="swatches {{#bogoMessaging}}swatches-bogo{{/bogoMessaging}}">
							<ul>
								{{#swatches}}
									{{^isColorSoldOut}}

										<li class="swatch swatch{{colorSeq}} {{navItemOrder}}">
											<a class="swatch-link" href="{{swatchUrl}}" data-productid="{{catentryId}}" data-seq="{{colorSeq}}" data-categoryid="{{categoryId}}" data-longSku="{{longSku}}" {{#lazyloadImages}}data-backgroundImg="//anf.scene7.com/is/image/anf/{{brand}}_{{productCollection}}_{{swatchVar}}"{{/lazyloadImages}}{{^lazyloadImages}}style="background-image:url('//anf.scene7.com/is/image/anf/{{brand}}_{{product.collection}}_{{swatchVar}}');"{{/lazyloadImages}}>
												<span>{{colorName}}</span>
											</a>
										</li>
									{{/isColorSoldOut}}
								{{/swatches}}
							</ul>
						</div>
					{{/hasSwatches}}
				</div>
			</li>
		{{/products}}
	{{/categories}}
</script>
<script class="recommendations-main__template" type="text/template">
 {{#recs}}
		<li class="recommendation-product recommended-mustache {{brand}}" data-seq="{{recs.seq}}" data-productid="{{recs.productId}}" data-categoryid="{{recs.categoryId}}" data-priceflag="{{recs.priceFlag}}" data-collectionid="{{recs.collection}}">
			<!-- TODO:OLDCODEBASE remove data objects from <a> tag-->
			<a href="{{{recs.url}}}" data-seq="{{recs.seq}}" data-productid="{{recs.productId}}" data-categoryid="{{recs.categoryId}}" data-priceflag="{{recs.priceFlag}}" data-collectionid="{{recs.collection}}">
				<img src="{{recs.image}}?{{S7Preset}}" class="recs-img" />

			{{#isKids}}
			</a>
			{{/isKids}}

			{{#shortDesc}}
			<ul class="recommendation-info">
				<li class="recommendation-name">{{{recs.name}}}</li>
				<li class="recommendation-short-description">{{recs.shortDesc}}</li>
			{{/shortDesc}}

			{{^shortDesc}}
			<ul class="recommendation-info noShortDesc">
				<li class="recommendation-name">{{{recs.name}}}</li>
			{{/shortDesc}}

			{{#price.showSalePrice}}
				<li class="recommendation-listPrice">{{#price.showLowListPrice}}{{{price.lowListPriceFmt}}} - {{/price.showLowListPrice}}{{{price.highListPriceFmt}}}</li>
				<li class="recommendation-salePrice">{{#price.showLowPrice}}{{{price.lowPriceFmt}}} - {{/price.showLowPrice}}{{{price.highPriceFmt}}}</li>
			{{/price.showSalePrice}}

			{{^price.showSalePrice}}
				<li class="recommendation-listPrice noSale">{{#price.showLowListPrice}}{{{price.lowListPriceFmt}}} - {{/price.showLowListPrice}}{{{price.highListPriceFmt}}}</li>
			{{/price.showSalePrice}}

			</ul>

			{{^isKids}}
			</a>
			{{/isKids}}
		</li>
	{{/recs}}
</script>
